name: ICANM 2020: 8th International Conference & Exhibition on Advanced & Nano Materials
content: The 8th International Conference & Exhibition on Advanced & Nano Materials (ICANM2020) will take place from August 24 to 26 in Ottawa, Canada. This conference offers the unique opportunity to share your research work and refresh your knowledge.It also provides an excellent platform to meet existing colleagues and to greet new delegates. ICANM is an annual regular conference since 2013 and has been successfully held in many cities in Canada. This highly interactive conference and exposition is designed to promote information exchange among scientists, technologists, engineers, entrepreneurs and exhibitors involved in materials science, specifically in the area of Advanced and Nano materials.
